title: Beef Wellington with tarragon sauce
description: Beef Wellington traditionally has pâté spread over the top of the fillet, which makes it very rich. This recipe is lighter, but with a lovely taste from the tarragon.
ingredients: 1 egg, beaten with a dash of milk
salt and freshly ground black pepper
350g/12oz mixed mushrooms (such as button, chestnut, wild), thinly sliced
